üì¶ Medical Inventory Test Barcodes

Scan these barcodes to test the scanner functionality

üéØ How to Use These Barcodes

  1. Open the app at http://localhost:5177/ in your browser
  2. Seed the test data using the browser console script (see seed-browser-console.js)
  3. Navigate to the Scanner page by clicking the "Scan" button
  4. Click "Start Scanning" to activate your camera
  5. Scan these barcodes by holding them in front of your camera:
    • Display this page on a second screen, or
    • Print this page and scan the printed barcodes
  6. Verify results:
    • Items with yellow border are LOW STOCK
    • Items with red border are CRITICAL LOW STOCK
